ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Prepare pudding according to package directions and allow to set before adding topping
Fold whipped topping gently into pudding to maintain airy texture
Add gummi worms just before serving to keep them fresh and visible
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple assembled pie lets quality ingredients shine. How can you fold whipped topping into pudding without deflating it?
